## Description
Add comprehensive CLI and web UI for manual metadata editing using the design in docs/METADATA_EDITOR_PLAN.md.

## Features
- Manual metadata search across multiple sources
- Field-level editing with validation
- Alternate title management
- Metadata locking to prevent overwrites
- Bulk editing capabilities
- History tracking with rollback

## Technical Requirements
### Backend
- RESTful API for metadata operations
- Metadata source aggregation
- Validation rules engine
- Audit log for changes
- Conflict detection

### Frontend
- React-based metadata editor component
- Real-time validation
- Drag-and-drop for images
- Keyboard shortcuts
- Responsive design

### CLI
- Interactive metadata search
- Field editing commands
- Batch operations
- Export/import functionality

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Web UI allows searching and editing all metadata fields
- [ ] CLI provides equivalent functionality
- [ ] Changes are validated before saving
- [ ] Locked fields cannot be overwritten
- [ ] History shows all changes with timestamps
- [ ] Rollback functionality works correctly
- [ ] Bulk operations handle errors gracefully
- [ ] API documentation is complete
- [ ] Unit tests cover all operations
- [ ] Integration tests verify UI functionality

## UI/UX Requirements
- Search results show confidence scores
- Visual indicators for locked fields
- Inline editing where appropriate
- Confirmation dialogs for destructive operations
- Progress indicators for bulk operations

## Testing Requirements
- Unit tests for validation logic
- Integration tests for API endpoints
- E2E tests for UI workflows
- Performance tests for bulk operations

Depends on online metadata sources (#351, #890).
